sources.title: MSCI pushes back against shareholder proposal claiming anti-Israel bias
sources.snippet: MSCI has pushed back against a shareholder proposal claiming its ESG ratings "have a distinct anti-Israel bias and double standard towards Israel".. The resolution, filed by the National Center for Public Policy Research (NCPPR), a conservative think tank, calls on the ratings and data provider to remove "anti-Israel bias from its ESG ratings criteria".
